meanings.sent1: The baby vocalizes when she babbles.
meanings.sent2: She vocalizes clearly during her speech therapy sessions.
meanings.sent3: The parrot vocalizes in different tones to mimic human speech.
meanings.sent4: The engine vocalizes a rhythmic hum as it runs smoothly.
meanings.sent5: The singer vocalizes with passion, filling the room with her voice.

meanings.sent1: He vocalizes his opinions during the meeting.
meanings.sent2: She vocalizes her excitement when she sees her favorite band.
meanings.sent3: The cat vocalizes loudly to demand attention.
meanings.sent4: His guitar solo vocalizes his emotions without words.
meanings.sent5: The actor vocalizes his lines with great emotion on stage.

meanings.definition: To sing or make vocal sounds
meanings.sent1: The bird vocalizes a beautiful melody at dawn.
meanings.sent2: They vocalize together in harmony during choir practice.
meanings.sent3: The dog vocalizes happily when its owner returns home.
meanings.sent4: The wind vocalizes through the trees, creating a soothing sound.
meanings.sent5: The children vocalize a cheerful song as they play outside.
